name: The Demon Castle's Trail
description:
Hi, this game you will play as a hero. Travel from city to city To travel across the continent through many cities and obstacles in order to defeat the Demon Lord.

While traveling, you'll need to allocate resources to travel to each city. Remember that the journey does not arrive immediately. You have to find food and rest.

In every city you reach there is a mission, items and stories await you. don't miss it.

in traveling in each city There will be different monsters and items for you to discover.

Hope you enjoy it And I'm waiting for your feedback.
